Join me for a talk on scaling technology in startups. This is an opportunity you won't want to miss! Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur with a groundbreaking idea or a seasoned founder looking to take your startup to the next level, this talk is designed to empower you with the tools and strategies you need to succeed.

I have decided to stay as your president, even though I lost the election.  I have been the target of unfair treatment and persecution by my political opponents, the crooked media, and other institutions part of the deep state.  Stepping down now would be tantamount to capitulating to these behind the scenes forces. I have been a victim of a witch hunt and the target of an intergalactic conspiracy and remaining in office is necessary to defend my messianic agenda and incur payback on anybody that disagrees with me.
